title: Forensics & Investigation Book Collection
description:
40 books dedicated to various aspects of forensics, and investigation.  Subjects include:
-Arson and Bomb Scene Investigation
-Ballistics and Gunshot Residue
-Biometrics
-Death Scene Investigation
-High Tech Crime
-Private Investigation
-Serial Offenders

There are also various books that cover the law and forensics in general.  I have a few quick notes regarding this torrent.  So you aren&#039;t surprised, obviously the death scene investigation books show REAL images of the deceased, to further educate the reader, so in short, the books can be pretty upsetting for some.  You have been warned.  Additionally, I DO have material regarding law enforcement, but that will be on another torrent I will put up within a week.
